welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sand Springs, the charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly community. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at R.Lloyd Jones Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at R.Lloyd Jones Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tulsa International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Concourse
terminals.description: The North Concourse at Tulsa International Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: South Concourse
terminals.description: The South Concourse at Tulsa International Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free Wi-Fi throughout the airport.
